status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Ex vivo culture of spleen derived macrophages
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ee4ji","text":"Dissect spleens from abdominal cavity and filter it through a 40-μm nylon strainer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ex vivo culture of spleen derived macrophages
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3jv0d","text":"Then, obtain a single splenic cell suspension. Culture cells in Roswell Park Memorial Institute (RPMI) medium 1640 RPMI 1640 (BioConcept 1-41F01-I) supplemented with 10% FBS,   L-Glutamine and antimicrobials (Penicillin-Streptomycin Pen 10'000 IU/ml Strep   and amphotericin B (  BioConcept). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":175,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":256,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":278,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"691jq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"1CEE7FE0E34E11ED9EC803C6554CEA1B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"23DCB980CF9811EDB2B6CBD75EC16E55","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1798}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"29ED7580CF9811EDB2B6CBD75EC16E55","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1956}}}}

steps.section: Ex vivo culture of spleen derived macrophages
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cpfhj","text":"Culture mouse microglia BV2 cells from Elabscience (No.: EP-CL-0493) in parallel for each spleen culture preparation as controls. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Ex vivo culture of spleen derived macrophages
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dcl6v","text":"Briefly, maintain BV2 cells in Roswell Park Memorial Institute (RPMI) medium 1640 supplemented (BioConcept 1-41F01-I) with 10% FBS (FBS-02-0500),   L-Glutamine 5-10K50-H) and antimicrobials (Penicillin-Streptomycin Pen 10'000 IU/ml Strep   and amphotericin B ( ) (BioConcept 4-01F00-H).
